      Deletes a restored file using the file path created previously.
      void SystemDatabase.deleteUpdate(ProtocolState state)
      Removes all database info of the SHA256 from the initiated backups database and from the chunks database.
      private boolean RestoreProtocol.getchunkLoop(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Sends the required GETCHUNK messages for backing up a file and then waits on reception of all the relevant CHUNK messages.
      private java.lang.String TimeoutHandler.getChunkPath(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Returns where a chunk should be stored using the current Peer and ProtocolState.
      private void SystemHandler.handleChunk(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Handles the responses to a RESTORE protocol by passing along the chunk data received.
      private void SystemHandler.handleDelete(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Handles DELETE protocol by deleting all the chunks referring to this protocol's instance SHA256.
      private void SystemHandler.handleDeleted(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Handles the responses to an enhanced DELETE protocol by counting the unique DELETED responses up to the expected number of responses.
      private boolean TimeoutHandler.handleEnhancedBackup(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Handles enhanced BACKUP protocol by checking if desired replication degree has already been met by other Peers.
      private void SystemHandler.handleGetchunk(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Handles RESTORE protocol by checking local storage for requested SHA256 + chunkNo and sending the CHUNK message if found.
      private void SystemHandler.handleInfo(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Handles RETRIEVE protocol responses by setting the received file info for using in a RESTORE/DELETE.
      private void SystemHandler.handlePutchunk(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Handles BACKUP protocol by writing the received chunk only if it doesn't exist already and then sending a response STORED message.
      private void SystemHandler.handleRemoved(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Handles RECLAIM protocol by checking if replication degree falls below the desired one.
      private void SystemHandler.handleRetrieve(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Handles RETRIEVE protocol by checking the database in search of the received file name or file path.
      private void SystemHandler.handleStarted(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Handles pending DELETE protocol by checking if the started Peer has pending deletions on this Peer.
      private void SystemHandler.handleStored(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Handles the responses to a BACKUP protocol by counting the unique STORED responses up to the desired replication degree for this protocol instance.
      void SystemDatabase.putchunkUpdate(ProtocolState state, int size)
      Updates the database with the received PUTCHUNK message info about a chunk.
      int SystemDatabase.removedUpdate(ProtocolState state)
      Updates the database with the REMOVED message info.
      private void TimeoutHandler.sendChunkTCP(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Sends CHUNK message through TCP by connecting to the server specified by the GETCHUNK message received.
      void SystemDatabase.storedUpdate(ProtocolState state)
      Updates the database with the received STORED message info about a chunk.
      private void RestoreProtocol.writeRestoredChunks(Peer peer, ProtocolState state)
      Writes a set of chunk data to a single file using the file path created previously.
